title: Lossless Data Compression with Neural Networks
abstract: We describe our implementation of a lossless data compressor using neural networks. We tuned Long Short-Term Memory and Transformer based models in order to achieve a fast training convergence. We evaluated the performance on the widely used enwik8 Hutter Prize benchmark.

tldr.text: This work describes the implementation of a lossless data compressor using neural networks and tuned Long Short-Term Memory and Transformer based models in order to achieve a fast training convergence.
